EmailTemplate.name: 16MayWeb-Social-Media.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: May Webinar: ROI from Social Media
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us on May 16 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "How Solopreneurs Can Achieve ROI from Social Media <http://info.mbopartners.com/16MayWebSocialMedia_RegistrationPage.html>."
Have you spent valuable resources on social media initiatives, only to be frustrated by a lack of ROI? Maybe you've thought about using social media to promote your business, but didn't know where to start?
You're not alone, and that's why MBO Partners is welcoming social media expert and best-selling author Jennifer Abernethy of Socially Deliveredâ„¢ and The Sales Lounge to our webinar series. Abernethy will explain how to use social media to find new clients, increase brand awareness, and modernize your consultancy. Using her techniques, you will create positive return on your time investment, giving your solo business a competitive edge. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/16MayWebSocialMedia_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
